clauses.title: This service does not track you
clauses.description: The document excerpt needs to include the words "[the service] does not track [users]" or "[the service] does not use any tracking technology".
clauses.clause_text: We do not use cookies.

case.text: You are not being tracked

clauses.title: Features of the website are made available under a free software license
clauses.description: This case applies to services under licenses that are free as in "freedom". According to the Free Software Foundation, "free software is the software that grants the user the freedom to share, study, and modify it". Furthermore, the code is entirely open source and may be used without any restriction, including for commercial purposes.
clauses.clause_text: all Tutanota clients are published as open source under GPLv3.

case.text: Features of the website are made available under a free software license

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for protecting citizens privacy with strong data regulations. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case why the jurisdiction is friendly to user privacy protection.
clauses.clause_text: The laws of the Federal Republic of Germany shall apply.

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.

clauses.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text:
In addition we are obliged to
delete, to correct or to restrict processing of the data stored about you upon
request.

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked
clauses.description: The Service disclaims that IP adresses from users are not collected (or anonymized) nor shared.
clauses.clause_text: Also: "In order to maintain operations, for prevention of abuse and and for visitors analysis, IP addresses of users are processed. Storage only takes place for IP addresses made anonymous which are therefore not personal data any more."

case.text: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked

clauses.title: User-generated content is encrypted, and this service cannot decrypt it
clauses.description: Content generated by the users is end-to-end encrypted, in a way that it can't be accessed by anyone unauthorised, and even the service has no technical means to decrypt it.
clauses.clause_text: all user data is stored end-to-end encrypted in Tutanota

case.text: User-generated content is encrypted, and this service cannot decrypt it

clauses.title: Archives of their agreements are provided so that changes can be viewed over time
clauses.description: This case applies to Services whose agreements provide previous versions, so that users can compare them and understand how the Service seems to evolve regarding user rights.
clauses.clause_text: The previous version of these Terms and Conditions can be found here.

case.text: Archives of their agreements are provided so that changes can be viewed over time

clauses.title: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
clauses.description: The service will remove personal data from its systems once it is no longer required. Depending on the type of information and the reason it was collected, data retention periods will vary.
clauses.clause_text: The personal data shall be deleted no later than 30 days after termination of the contract, unless specific reasons to the contrary apply in an individual case.

case.text: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

clauses.title: The service does not share user information with third parties
clauses.description: Information collected from users by this service is not given to third parties.
clauses.clause_text: We will not disclose this personal data to third parties.

case.text: Your personal data is not shared with third parties

clauses.title: You can retrieve an archive of your data
clauses.description: Users can request a copy of the data collected through the services and infer from it the amount of personal information that is processed and stored by the Service. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: You can make use of your right to data portability by exporting your personal data stored with us in Tutanota.

case.text: You can retrieve an archive of your data

clauses.title: The service is open-source
clauses.description: The code of the software is open-source and the users can have access to the source code.
clauses.clause_text:
Is Tutanota open source?

Yes

case.text: The service is open-source

clauses.title: You will be notified about website maintenance
clauses.description: Users will be notified before their experience is impacted due to website maintenance.
clauses.clause_text:
If Tutao
estimates that the time for maintenance and software updates will lead to a
downtime of more than three hours, Tutao will inform all paying customers
three days in advance.

case.text: You will be notified about website maintenance

clauses.title: This service does not sell your personal data
clauses.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.
clauses.clause_text: There will be no sale of data.

case.text: Your personal data is not sold

clauses.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the GDPR.
clauses.clause_text: Processing of personal data takes place in compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)

case.text: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users

clauses.title: Provides information on security practices
clauses.description: It's important to know what security measures are taken to protect your data from unauthorized access. This case applies to the Agreements that precisely explain their security practices.
clauses.clause_text: Under the FAQs, Tutanota gives various information about the service's security practices under the sections "Your Tutanota Password" and "Security and Privacy." Details include the algorithms used to hash passwords, information about encryption algorithms, private and public key information, etc.

case.text: Information is provided about security practices

clauses.title: Accessibility to this service is guaranteed at 99% or more
clauses.clause_text:
On 2024-05-11 20:54:25 UTC, xevagom599 (33089)  wrote:
          I enjoy every one of the post, My spouse and i liked, I might like additional data using this type of, since it can be pretty nice., Regards created for supplying.
토토사이트 순위 모음

case.text: Accessibility to this service is guaranteed at 99% or more

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: Status: May 25, 2018

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis
clauses.description: You card will be billed on recurring basis unless cancelled. For instance, monthly or annual subscriptions.
clauses.clause_text:
If the contract is not terminated, the
contract is automatically renewed with the same billing period.

case.text: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis

clauses.title: Service does not allow alternative accounts
clauses.description:
Services that do not allow multiple or alternative accounts are covered by this case.
Alternative accounts can contribute to an increased privacy, but can also be used to manipulate discussions and polls and might decrease the trustworthiness of a person.
clauses.clause_text: 4.7. Each natural person is prohibited to sign up for more than one free of charge Tutanota account for private use. For additional accounts a paid tariff must be selected which allows adding aliases and user accounts.

case.text: Alternative accounts are not allowed

clauses.title: You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages
clauses.description: Users are not allowed to use the service for chain letters, junk mail, spamming or any other distribution of content to people who have not agreed to receiving it.
clauses.clause_text:
The sending of emails is inadmissible if it is a mass-mailing to
recipients without their consent and/or if it is a promotional email
and consent of the recipient is not given even though this is required
(hereafter referred to as spam).

case.text: You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages

clauses.title: The service is transparent regarding goverment request or inqueries
clauses.description: Weight was 30.

case.text: The service is transparent regarding government requests or inquiries that may involve your data.

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in Hanover, Germany
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction (specified in the title of each point by replacing the "X").
clauses.clause_text: 14.2 The place of jurisdiction for demands resulting from differences between the parties to a contract, in particular about the conclusion of a contract, its execution or its termination - insofar as the customer is a general merchant, a corporate body under public law, or a separate estate under public law - is Hanover, Germany.

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in location X
